[舍]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *hljaːʔ, *hljaːs ): phonetic 余 ( OC *la ) + semantic 口 . 余 is the original pictogram for this word; 口 was added later to distinguish.

[捨]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *hljaːʔ ): semantic 扌 ( “ hand ” ) + phonetic 舍 ( OC *hljaːʔ, *hljaːs ) – to discard with the hand.
